content: आरोहणं {@--1@} The act of rising, ascending, mounting; आरोहणार्थं नवयौवनेन कामस्य सोपानमिव प्रयुक्तं <ls>Ku. 1. 39.</ls> {@--2@} Riding (on a horse &c). {@--3@} A stair-case, ladder. {@--4@} The rising or growing of new shoots, growing (of plants). {@--5@} A raised stage for dancing. {@--6@} A carriage (<ab>Ved.</ab>).
